com.sonyericsson.extras.liveware.extension.util.widget
Class NotificationWidgetEvent

java.lang.Object
  com.sonyericsson.extras.liveware.extension.util.widget.NotificationWidgetEvent

public class NotificationWidgetEvent
extends java.lang.Object

The notification widget event class represents an event in the notification database.
